Sat., Jan. 13: deadline for travel scholarships is Dec. 18 and application deadline is Jan. 5. Don't Miss out. Apply for the 2018 ACLU of Idaho Activist Academy today!
  


2018 ACTIVIST ACADEMY

Saturday, January 13, 9 a.m.
Idaho Statehouse
700 W. Jefferson
Boise, ID 83702

Apply Today
Share this:           

The Statehouse is the People’s House

Being an engaged member of the community is as important as it has ever been and we want to make sure that you have the tools and knowledge necessary to become an active participant in creating social change. To that effect, we'd like to invite you to the 2018 ACLU Activist Academy. This day-long community training event will teach you about our current systems of power and how to influence them, while providing you with the skills to become a successful community activist.

Whether you're a seasoned veteran in the community or a newly engaged voice, we encourage you to apply to the academy!

To apply, simply fill out an application and either e-mail it to jwoodson@acluidaho.org, or mail to:

ACLU of Idaho
Activist Academy
P.O. Box 1897
Boise, ID 83701

If you would like to submit your application in-person, please contact Jeremy Woodson at (208) 344-9750 x1211 or by email at jwoodson@acluidaho.org. Applications are due by 5 p.m. on Friday, January 5.

We are pleased to offer limited travel scholarships for those outside of the Treasure Valley metropolitan area (though we encourage you to seek other avenues of fundraising as well). The deadline for applications with scholarship requests is 5 p.m. on Monday, December 18.

Acceptance notifications will be sent out shortly after the application deadlines. Travel scholarships will be announced by Friday, December 29.

This training is made possible by the generous support of the Pride Foundation. The ACLU of Idaho provides equal opportunity trainings and encourages individuals from all communities across the state to apply, including women, people of color, persons with disabilities, and lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender individuals.

We look forward to seeing you there!

Apply Today
